H0.text: Who was the third President of the USA, following on from George Washington and John Adams was also famed for his numerous inventions. Benjamin Franklin

H1.text: Who was the third President of the USA, following on from George Washington and John Adams was also famed for his numerous inventions. James Madison

H2.text: Who was the third President of the USA, following on from George Washington and John Adams was also famed for his numerous inventions. James Monroe

H3.text: Who was the third President of the USA, following on from George Washington and John Adams was also famed for his numerous inventions. T jefferson

A4.text: Thomas Jefferson was the third president of the United States from 1801 to 1809.

A5.text: Jefferson invented many small practical devices and improved contemporary inventions, including a revolving book-stand and a 'Great Clock' powered by the gravitational pull on cannonballs.
